abstract: 'San Francisco, the Panama Canal, Mobile, Pensacola, Livorno, New York and even Hollywood - I saw it all'.
description: John Hansen's war experience really started after World War II. Having been seconded into the US Navy, John was there to celebrate in the streets of California when the war ended. Then he travelled the world, transporting a variety of things, from war brides to coal. In the end, the world became his classroom.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001970; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Sale veterans] [June 2010]; Active; 2010
